00038         public static function getTYPO3Root() {
00039                 $path = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('SCRIPT_FILENAME');
00040                 $path = str_replace("/index.php","",$path);
00041                 return $path;

00051         protected static function markersCountAsSet($markers, $conditionValue) {
00052                 
00053                 // Find first || or && or !
00054                 $pattern = '/(_*([A-Za-z0-9]+)_*(\|\||&&)_*([^_]+)_*)|(_*(!)_*([A-Za-z0-9]+))/';
00055                 
00056                 session_start();
00057                 // recurse if there are more
00058                 if( preg_match($pattern, $conditionValue, $matches) ){
00059                         $isset = isset($markers['###' . $matches[2] . '###']);
00060                         if($matches[3] == '||' && $isset) {
00061                                 $return = true;
00062                         } elseif($matches[3] == '||' && !$isset) {
00063                                 $return = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs.php:: markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[4]);
00064                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && $isset) {
00065                                 $return = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs.php:: markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[4]);
00066                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && !$isset) {
00067                                 $return = false;
00068                         } elseif($matches[6] == '!' && !$isset) {
00069                                 return !(isset($markers['###' . $matches[7] . '###']) && $markers['###' . $matches[7] . '###'] != '');
00070                         } elseif($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] == 1) {
00071                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Invalid format of ISSET Marker. Hint: " . $matches[2]);
00072                         }
00073                 } else {
00074                         
00075                         // remove underscores
00076                         $pattern = '/_*/';
00077                         $str = preg_replace($pattern, $str, '');
00078                         
00079                         // end of recursion
00080                         $return = isset($markers['###' . $conditionValue . '###']) && ($markers['###' . $conditionValue . '###'] != '');
00081                 }
00082                 return $return;
00083         }

00095         public static function substituteIssetSubparts($subpart,$markers = array()){
00096                 $flags = array();
00097                 $nowrite = false;
00098                 $out = array();
00099                 foreach(split(chr(10), $subpart) as $line){
00100                 
00101                         // works only on it's own line
00102                         $pattern = '/###ISSET_+([^#]*)_*###/';
00103                         
00104                         // set for odd ISSET_xyz, else reset
00105                         if(preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches)) {
00106                                 if(!$flags[$matches[1]]) { // set
00107                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = true;
00108                 
00109                                         // set nowrite flag if required until the next ISSET_xyz
00110                                         // (only if not already set by envelop)
00111                                         if((!$this->markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[1])) && (!$nowrite)) {
00112                                                 $nowrite = $matches[1];
00113                                         }
00114                                 } else { // close it
00115                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = false;
00116                                         if($nowrite == $matches[1]) {
00117                                                 $nowrite = 0;
00118                                         }
00119                                 }
00120                         } else { // It is no ISSET_line. Write if permission is given.
00121                                 if(!$nowrite) {
00122                                         $out[] = $line;
00123                                 }
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 $out = implode(chr(10),$out);
00127                 
00128                 return $markers;
00129         }

00152         public static function sanitizePath($path) {
00153                 if(substr($path,0,1) != "/") {
00154                         $path = "/".$path;
00155                 }
00156                 if(substr($path,strlen($path)-1) != "/" && !strstr($path,".")) {
00157                         $path = $path."/";
00158                 }
00159                 return $path;
00160         }
00161         
00170         public static function getFilledLangMarkers(&$template,$langFile) {
00171                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->readLLfile($langFile);
00172                 $langMarkers = array();
00173                 if ($langFile != '') {
00174                         $aLLMarkerList = array();
00175                         preg_match_all('/###LLL:.+?###/Ssm', $template, $aLLMarkerList);
00176                         
00177                         foreach($aLLMarkerList[0] as $LLMarker){
00178                                 $llKey =  strtolower(substr($LLMarker,7,strlen($LLMarker)-10));
00179                                 $marker = $llKey;
00180                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'] = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:' . $langFile. ':' . $llKey));
00181                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.strtoupper($marker).'###'] = $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'];
00182                         }
00183                 }
00184             return $langMarkers;
00185         }
00186         
00194         public static function getFilledValueMarkers(&$gp) {
00195                 if (isset($gp) && is_array($gp)) {
00196                         foreach($gp as $k=>$v) {
00197                                 if (!ereg('EMAIL_', $k)) {
00198                                         if (is_array($v)) {
00199                                                 $v = implode(',', $v);
00200                                         }
00201                                         $v = trim($v);
00202                                         if ($v != "") {
00203                                                 if(get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00204                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = stripslashes(self::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v));
00205                                                 } else {
00206                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = self::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v);
00207                                                 }
00208                                         } else {
00209                                                 $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = '';
00210                                         }
00211                                 } //if end
00212                         } // foreach end
00213                 } // if end
00214                 return $markers;
00215         }
00216         
00225         public static function reverse_htmlspecialchars($mixed) {
00226                 $htmltable = get_html_translation_table(HTML_ENTITIES);
00227                 foreach($htmltable as $key => $value) {
00228                         $mixed = ereg_replace(addslashes($value),$key,$mixed);
00229                 }
00230                 return $mixed;
00231         }       
00232         
00241         public static function debugMessage($message,$extended = true) {
00242                 session_start();
00243                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode']) {
00244                         if($extended) {
00245                                 $message = "#######################################<br />".$message."<br />#######################################<br />";
00246                         }
00247                         print $message."<br />";
00248                 }
00249         }
00250         
00258         public static function debugArray($arr) {
00259                 if(!is_array($arr)) {
00260                         return;
00261                 }
00262                 foreach($arr as $key=>$value) {
00263                         if(is_array($value)) {
00264                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00265                         }
00266                         $fields[] = $key."=".$value;
00267                 }
00268                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage(implode("<br />",$fields),false);
00269         }

00280         public static function removeUnfilledMarkers($content) {
00281                 return preg_replace('/###.*?###/', '', $content);
00282         }
00283         
00291         public static function resolvePath($path) {
00292                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00293                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00294                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00295                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extPath($parts[1]);
00296                 }
00297                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00298                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00299                 return $path;
00300         }
00301         
00309         public static function resolveRelPath($path) {
00310                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00311                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00312                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00313                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath($parts[1]);
00314                 }
00315                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00316                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00317                 return $path;
00318         }
00319         
00327         public static function resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($path) {
00328                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00329                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00330                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00331                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath($parts[1]);
00332                 }
00333                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00334                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00335                 $path = str_replace("../","",$path);
00336                 return $path;
00337         }
